By spending the night with Bruce, Hal did in fact mean that explicitly, his limbs tangled with Bruce's as the sheets lay in a mess around their bodies. Between the two of them, the room had warmed up considerably. Even the chill of the night air couldn't reach them.-----A 5 times Hal notices his place in the batfamily +1 time Bruce notices the place Hal has in his batfamily story.
